component.name: StandardRowListItem
component.script:
sub init() print "StandardRowListItem - init()" m.itemLabel = m.top.findNode("itemLabel") m.itemBkg = m.top.findNode("itemBkg") end sub
sub itemContentChanged() print "StandardRowListItem - itemContentChanged" item = m.top.itemContent if item <> invalid print "Item title: "; item.title m.itemLabel.text = item.title else print "Item content is invalid" end if end sub
